English: Play sound on push to talk
Description: A game setting that enables/disables a click sound that plays every time the user pushes the "push to talk" button.

French.Translation: Jouer un son en activant PTT

Italian.Translation: Riproduci suono per push to talk

Spanish.Translation: Reproducir sonido al pulsar para hablar

Polish.Translation: Odtwórz dźwięk po naciśnięciu Naciśnij, aby mówić

Japanese.Translation: 通話ボタン押下時に音を鳴らす

Korean.Translation: 눌러서 말할 때 클릭 사운드 재생

name: MainMenu.Settings.PlaySoundOnPushToTalk
